1400540.name: TERA Battle Arena - Elleon Hero DLC
1400540.description:
Experience the PvP Revolution in TERA Battle Arena!


• Team Combat with a Personal Touch: Perfect your personal fighting style and use your skills on the battleground to claim victory for you and your team in fast-paced matches!
• True Action Combat: TERA BATTLE ARENA (TBA) brings the popular TERA feature into the world of MOBAs.
• Heroic Choices: Meet a host of different heroes from Arborea with unique skill sets who join the field fully kitted out for battle, without any need to grind for equipment.
• For Newcomers and Veterans: TBA is available to all players and is completely independent of the main game, so you don’t need to know or play the TERA MMO to enjoy TBA.
• One Client, Two Worlds: Whether you play TBA, the TERA MMO, or both, you only need one download.

You require the TERA game client to use this package. Both game modes can be played with this client.

This package contains:

Elleon – Hero of the Valkyon Federation

Enter the Battle Arena as Elleon! The hero of the Valkyon Federation is the very epitome of Arborean legend. His mastery of the sword is second to none, while his loyalty to his allies is beyond reproach. Elleon has brought his explosive speed and brute force to bear for the good of the Federation on many occasions, even after suffering terrible injury and corruption at the hand of the god Killian. In combat he deftly wields his twin swords with deathly agility and unbridled force.


Elleon’s special abilities:
* Swift and agile
* Can stun and reduce the enemy’s endurance
* Generates edge for even more power
1400540.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
